mapper.select: select level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef from goods_category start with cateCodeRef is null connect by prior cateCode = cateCodeRef
mapper.insert: insert into goods(gdsNum, gdsName, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes) values(goods_seq.nextval, #{gdsName}, #{cateCode}, #{gdsPrice}, #{gdsStock}, #{gdsDes})
mapper.select: select * from goods order by gdsNum desc
